con:configuration.query: Select BLUADMIN.STATE.STATE_ID as BLUADMIN_STATE_STATE_ID From BLUADMIN.STATE Where BLUADMIN.STATE.STATE_CODE = 'US'

con:config.script: def Company_Name = context.expand( '${DataSource#Company_Name}' ) log.info Company_Name Company_Name = Company_Name.replace("\"", "") String date = new Date() date = date.replaceAll(":","_") date = date.replaceAll(" ","_") log.info date Company_Name = date + "_" + Company_Name Company_Name = "\"" + Company_Name + "\"" //Company_Name = Company_Name + "Update Company" log.info Company_Name testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Company_Name", Company_Name)
